# pacta.loanbook

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

The goal of pacta.loanbook is to provide and easy way to load and install all
packages needed for running PACTA for Banks.

It also serves as a space to provide thorough and comprehensive documentation for
running PACTA for Banks, in the form of a cookbook (**ADD LINK**).

## Installation

You can install the development version of pacta.loanbook from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("RMI-PACTA/pacta.loanbook")
```
